remarks: Property defining a Hermitian Hilbert space operator.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Jan-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
elhmop $p |- ( T e. HrmOp <-> ( T : ~H --> ~H /\ A. x e. ~H A. y e. ~H ( x .ih ( T ` y ) ) = ( ( T ` x ) .ih y ) ) ) $.
$d T x y $.
